# horizontalAngle

**Instance Property**

An angle in radians that indicates the azimuthal direction to the nearby object.

## Declaration

```swift
var horizontalAngle: Float? { get }
```

## Discussion

The framework sets a value of this property when [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration/isCameraAssistanceEnabled] is `true`.

This property is `nil` when direction is unavailable, such as when the app runs on Apple Watch.

## Acquiring relative direction

- **direction**: A vector that points from the user’s device in the direction of the peer device.
- **verticalDirectionEstimate**: The estimation of a nearby object’s vertical position as it relates to the user’s device.
- **NINearbyObject.VerticalDirectionEstimate**: Estimations of a nearby object’s vertical position in relation to the user’s device.
